entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • labels not showing #24778
  • [Android] Java.Lang.IllegalArgumentException: 'No view found for id 0x7f0900fd (com.twe.elon:id/labeled) for fragment NavigationRootManager_ElementBasedFragment{e99ccf3} (d735450b-8b7e-4e10-87d0-3b9a8251e4b3 id=0x7f0900fd)' #24774
  • Regression Alert! Shadow parameters got factored?! Danger to production apps! #24773
  • Coding #24772
  • CarouselView Animation frozen Android #24771

Closed

  • Cannot publish to App Store . IPA generation error #24591
  • [regression/8.0.80] [Android] ObjectDisposedException with AndroidX.AppCompat.Widget.AppCompatImageView #24757
    .NET 8 SR9

PullRequests

Created

  • Adding items to windows ObservableItemTemplateCollection #24777
    community ✨
  • IndicatorView with DataTemplate - improvements #24776
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-activityindicator
  • Improve MauiFactory performance by avoiding reflection to get base classes #24775
    community ✨

Updated

  • Applying visibility change to child controls #20154
    community ✨, area-controls-general
  • Android Ecosystem updates for `net9.0-rc.2` #24665
    do-not-merge, area-infrastructure
  • NavigationBarColors from NavigationPage not changing on AppTheme changing - fix #24766
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Custom font icon is not rendered in a shell tabbar tab #24721
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Improve measure invalidation and legacy Layout(s) performance #24532
    area-layout, community ✨
